tools.httpserver
Class SslSocketFactory

java.lang.Object
  tools.httpserver.SslSocketFactory

public class SslSocketFactory
extends java.lang.Object

SSL server Factory, used to create SSL server from raw certificate (without JVM options) Supports keystore/SSL certificate creation, loading and saving

Author:
Karel MITTIG
